characters: Multiple pedestrians, including a child in a blue jacket on the right side of the road, a woman with a child on the left side of the road, a man in a yellow jacket on the left side of the road, and a man in a blue shirt crossing the road.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of 'ghost probing' behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly appears from the right side of the road, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a woman with a child suddenly appears from the left side of the road, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a man in a yellow jacket suddenly appears from the left side of the road, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the fourth sequence, a man in a blue shirt suddenly appears from the left side of the road, emerging from behind a parked vehicle.
actions: The observer vehicle is driving at a moderate speed. The child on the right side of the road suddenly runs into the driving lane, creating an immediate collision risk. The woman with a child on the left side of the road suddenly runs into the driving lane, creating an immediate collision risk. The man in a yellow jacket on the left side of the road suddenly runs into the driving lane, creating an immediate collision risk. The man in a blue shirt on the left side of the road suddenly runs into the driving lane, creating an immediate collision risk.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, pedestrians, and a child on the right side of the road.
